## flipdownWidgets

---------------------------------------------

[flipdownWidgets]()，在Shiny或Rmarkdown中创建倒计时时钟。

<i class="fab fa-lg fa-github fa-fw"></i><a href="https://github.com/fanggong/flipdownWidgets">View Code</a>

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(flipdownWidgets)
flipdownWidgets(Sys.time() + 60*60*24*365, width = "80%", headings = c("天", "时", "分", "秒"))
```
